title: How to Make Tacos in a Bag

steps.headline: Clean the food, making sure to thoroughly wash all vegetables.
Cook the ground beef.
steps.description: You will need to get a skillet ready to cook the beef. Cook it until the meat is no longer pink.

steps.headline: Chop the vegetables.While the meat is cooking get out your chopping boards and start chopping the onions,lettuce,and cubing the tomatoes.
steps.description: (Make sure that you use different boards for each vegetable)

steps.headline: Serve the food.Get out five small serving bowls(one for each food except for the Fritos) and five serving spoons.Take the Fritos and crush them,but keep them inside the bag.Now open them and put any of the toppings on them.

text: Clean the food, making sure to thoroughly wash all vegetables.  Cook the ground beef. You will need to get a skillet ready to cook the beef. Cook it until the meat is no longer pink. Chop the vegetables.While the meat is cooking get out your chopping boards and start chopping the onions,lettuce,and cubing the tomatoes. (Make sure that you use different boards for each vegetable) Serve the food.Get out five small serving bowls(one for each food except for the Fritos) and five serving spoons.Take the Fritos and crush them,but keep them inside the bag.Now open them and put any of the toppings on them.  Finished.
